attributes.action: improve road safety and reduce death and injury on our roads by ensuring that all vehicles have appropriate mirrors - in particular foreign HGVs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BACKGROUND

In May 06 my wife was side swiped by a foreign lorry [changing lanes with NO warning] on the M25 

-	sending her spinning into the fast lane,

-	spinning back across all 4 lanes 

-	hitting the rear of the same lorry, 

-	taking out a road sign 

-	and ending up in a ditch with a total write off

To her amazement and those who saw it she walked away with severe shock and whiplash

10 months later she's still in pain, being treated and NO legal settlement 

She IS driving on the M25 - to care for a relative 

CONCERNS

Police saw it on CCTV & said it happens EVERY day with foreign trucks 

- as none have right mirrors 

SOLUTIONS 

1-Prosecute EVERY case not just fatal ones - making insurers tackle the issue 

2-Do NOT let drivers in at our ports without testing blind spot coverage

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
